scripts.build: npm run generate && npm run usercss
scripts.generate: node tools/generate.js && npm run perfectionist && node tools/clean.js
scripts.major: npm run lint && npm run usercss && versions -p -d -C major github-dark.css github-dark.user.css
scripts.minor: npm run lint && npm run usercss && versions -p -d -C minor github-dark.css github-dark.user.css
scripts.patch: npm run lint && npm run usercss && versions -p -d -C patch github-dark.css github-dark.user.css
